title: Growth Operations Manager
content:
To reinvent an industry, you have to build the best team. Join Formlabs if you want to bring groundbreaking professional 3D printers to the desktop of every designer, engineer, researcher, and artist in the world.
Formlabs is looking for an entrepreneurial leader who will serve as a commercial catalyst to drive new business opportunities from concept through launch. 
This role will also be tasked with projects to expand  our customer base and optimize new partnership opportunities. As our Growth Operations Manager, you will be responsible for understanding customer needs and identifying growth strategies for developing products.
If you have an entrepreneurial spirit to build and grow new products and are passionate about manufacturing technology, join us as our Growth Operations Manager..  
The Job:


Grow a world class brand around a new product and revenue stream for Formlabs


Comprehensively own the marketing execution of the new product as a 1 man army at first, including:



Set up a modern website / manage landing pages


Establish customer journey, sign up flow


Set up the customer funnel & continuously optimize



Collaborate closely with key stakeholders across product, engineering, sales, and marketing teams to align growth objectives with broader company goals.


Champion the voice of the customer, ensuring product features and enhancements are aligned with customer needs and preferences


Establish success metrics and measure the effectiveness of growth initiatives and customer acquisition, continuously iterating and refining our approach based on results 


You:


Entrepreneurial mindset, ideally started a business or participated in growing a business early on


Thrive in early stages of product definition, enjoys ambiguity, in exchange for freedom to operate


Experience launching multi-disciplinary technology products


5+ years of experience in product management, product marketing, or growth focused roles 


Prior experience in building and scaling successful product led growth strategies, with a demonstrated ability to drive down customer acquisition and increase lifetime value.


Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with a strong grasp of key growth metrics and data analysis tools.


Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with a track record of influencing cross-functional teams and driving alignment.


Experience working with international teams and a willingness to travel as needed.


Passion for creating delightful and intuitive product experiences that drive organic growth and customer satisfaction.


Bonus:


Started a company (whether successful or not) and grew it to some commercial success


Knowledge or working experience with 3D printing/additive manufacturing


MBA or advanced degree
